sense.name: a feeling of astonishment
sense.examples: I saw a look of surprise on John's face. Much to Sally's surprise, Bob offered her a promotion. The question seemed to take the candidate by surprise.

sense.name: an unexpected noteworthy event
sense.examples: John's birthday party is supposed to be a surprise. The CEO's resignation today came as a surprise. What a surprise to find a foot of snow on the ground this morning! Mary's big surprise turned out to be that she's pregnant. The enemy's surprise retreat was a foil to lure the troops into a trap.
